title: @Riot Rek'Sai's subtitle is a problem
body:
Forgive me if this is the wrong board but I figure that the naming of champs is technically part of the artistic process. 

Anyways, Rek'sai's subtitle, the void burrower is, let's face it, kinda dumb. Besides being incredible awkward to say in conversation, burrowing is not all that she does. She's queen of an entire species, she hunts and kills those foolish enough to travel through her domain. This would be like calling Cho'gath the "void eater," or Kha'zix the "void hisser." 

The Terror Beneath was the PERFECT subtitle, punchy, memorable, gets right to the point of what she is and what she does. I guess if you wanted to stick with the tradition of having "void" in the name, that's fine but I doubt anyone would mind if you made an exception. I certainly wouldn't.

**Quick Edit**: I didn't think this thread would be quite so well received so I wanted to say thanks all for your ideas and votes. Keep it up and someone will have to listen. ^.^

Because Riot stopped doing funny things as an intrinsic aspect of skins or characters.

"But Gear Kitty, what about Gnar? Also, why are you so awesome?"

Gnar isn't especially funny; he's adorable and awkward when compared to the people and creatures around him. He's a super powered toddler with a tantrum problem.

And I'm pawesome because unlike you furless fleshbags, I am a robotic feline AI that runs on cuteness and outputs a purr mixture of snark and constructive feedback that focuses on the dogged flaws and problems I see that run rampant when a studio like Riot went from pawwing fast and loose in it's early days (fur game design), and the difficulties raised from such practices while they attempt a more balanced and intuitive philosophy.

Attempt is a key word there.

It's a travesty that Riot is trying to take the game so seriously. Sure some things make more sense as serious, like Kalista (she would make no sense as a funny character) but having some real actually funny things in the game aside from Memes and the things that are being phased out would be nice.

Present day(+) Riot would not have made Surprise Party Fiddlesticks.

Present day Riot would not have made Battle Bunny Riven.

Present day Riot would not have made Janna's joke be about phone sex.

Present day Riot would have made Kog'Maw terrifying, and not the affably evil puke cannon we know.

Present day Riot would not have added Annie.

Present day Riot would not have put Caitlyn and Evelynn in fetish wear.

Some of those are good, some of those are bad, but all together they make the League charm we've come to know, the one that brought many of us to this game. Removing the Summoners and phasing out the comedy aspect (Unprepared Garen WHERE RITO!?) is a driving force behind why the game feels -stale- for some people. Just one of the reasons though (*squinty eyes at Narrative team because the Kalista Lore is not lore, but a story, and if they don't see that jobs need to start getting axed again*).
